section.section: All court records under this subtitle pertaining to a child shall be confidential and their contents may not be divulged, by subpoena or otherwise, except by order of the court on good cause shown.
Information obtained from a court record is subject to the provisions of §§ 1-201, 1-202, 1-204, and 1-205 of the Human Services Article.

On its own motion or on petition, and for good cause shown, the court:
May order the court records of a child sealed; and
Shall order them sealed after the child has reached the age of 21.
If sealed, the court records of a child may not be opened, for any purpose, except by order of the court on good cause shown.
